#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

long long fib_iterative(int n) {
    if (n <= 0) return 0;
    if (n == 1) return 1;
    
    long long a = 0; // f(n-2)
    long long b = 1; // f(n-1)
    long long result = 0;

    for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
        result = a + b;
        a = b;
        b = result;
    }
    return result;
}

int main() {
    for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {
        std::cout << fib_iterative(i) << std::endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
